elementInstanceKey.description: the element instance key tied to the subscription

bpmnProcessId.description: the BPMN process id tied to the subscription

messageKey.description: the key of the correlated message

interrupting.description:
{@code true} if the event tied to the subscription is interrupting. Otherwise, it
    returns {@code false} if the event is non-interrupting.

variables.description: the variables of this record. Can be empty.

processInstanceKey.description: the key of the corresponding process instance
